task.summary: Initial Implementation : 1- made a package for data and created in it data Task class , for simplicity now we only have one parameter (taskTitle: String) 2- created recycler_view_item.xml and made it show taskTitle 3- created a TaskRecyclerAdapter.kt class that contain the Adapter and View holder , for simplicity currently the view holder show TitleTask without any Listeners 4- I made a small example by making hardcoded list to test the RecycleView

Initial Implementation 2: 1- Created an Object Repo.kt that hold our list 2- added functions to each viewModel ,so i contact viewModel to get list and viewModel will contact the Repo to get list 3- added buttons to Task Fragment page and added simple implementation to it so we save out task or cancel it

Initial Implementation 3: 1- made the Task data class Parcelize so i can send it from one fragment to another 2- added and organized some code through functions 3- added delete button to Task Fragment page Visible only for editing Task 4- made the Save button do two functions depending on crating new Task or editing Task 5- added updateTaskOnList and deleteTaskFromList function to Repo 6- added a new Package for data.model and moved Task to it
Initial Implementation 4: 1- Changed add button to Floating Action Button 2- added addToBackStack() and popBackStack

Task Data 1: 1- I Decided to go with startDate and endDate as String in Task data class so later it will be compatible with RoomDB 2- commented the dummy data 3- added endDate to task_fragment.xml , implemented it into TaskFragment.kt using DatePickerDialog

Task Data 2: 1- added more parameters to data Class Task 2- updated some of the repo , TaskFragment.kt , TaskRecyclerAdapter.kt and MainFragment.kt functions 3- added checkButton and implemented it , Color Change when checked or not
